title: Virru Virru Lyrics Rekka Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Rekka Virru Virru Song Lyrics
Singer - Jithin Raj
Lyrics - Yugabharathi

Virru virru
virru virru
girru girru
girru girru

summa virru
virru virru virru
summa girru
girru girru girru

sandha kadayila
sakkara bannum
saami selayena
nikkura ponnum
dhoole..
asanjaa dhoole

oththa adiyila
kollura kannum
ulla vara unna
nenjula ennum
valu..
thuninju vazhu.

mella sirippadhum
kanna sulippadhum
maaththudhe route-a

solla thudippadhum
sokki kidappadhum
yethudhe sootta

pattukottayum
kanna dhaasanum
sonnadhu kaadhalathaan

summa virru
virru virru
virrunu kadhal sei

summa girru girru
girru girru
girrunu keranga vai

sandha kadayila
sakkara bannum
saami selayena
nikkura ponnum
dhoole..
asanjaa dhoole

oththa adiyila
kollura kannum
ulla vara unna
nenjula ennum
valu..
thuninju vazhu.

ubbuna aalum thannaala
olliyaa povaan loveaala
loveu oru oonjalu
aasi tharum angelu

tukkeraa pesum thannaala
kottume thooral unmela
loveu oru audio
kelu neeyum romeo

koni saakkum kottayaa
maari pogum
loveula

raja raja cholana
neeyum aava mannula

kadhal ennum kaveriyil
neeradu neeradu
adha vella neeyum
niththam niththam
poraadu poraadu poraadu

summa virru
virru virru
virrunu kadhal sei

summa girru girru
girru girru
girrunu keranga vai

sandha kadayila
sakkara bannum
saami selayena
nikkura ponnum
dhoole..
asanjaa dhoole

oththa adiyila
kollura kannum
ulla vara unna
nenjula ennum
vazhu..
thuninju vazhu.

mella sirippadhum
kanna sulippadhum
maaththudhe route-a

solla thudippadhum
sokki kidappadhum
yethudhe sootta

pattukottayum
kanna dhaasanum
sonnadhu kaadhalathaan

summa virru virru
virru virru
virrunu kadhal sei

summa girru girru
girru girru
girrunu keranga vai
